DOC.brief_title: The Pharmacokinetics Sirolimus When Combined With Cyclosporine Tacrolimus Renal Transplant Patients

The purpose study determine dose-level relationship sirolimus pharmacokinetic study . The dose-level relationship cyclosporine tacrolimus also assess . DOC.criteria: De novo kidney transplantation patient , age 13－65 year , aminotransferase concentration within 2 time upper limit normal . pregnancy , tuberculosis , hepatitis B C carrier status , human immunodeficiency virus－positive status , retransplantation multiorgan transplantation , history rheumatoid arthritis .
